text: There is always a cue around a headache. Search with your mind.
author: Easside MJ Kamara

text: Mystery can only be perceived by the ignorance.
author: Easside MJ Kamara

text: Education is a way of life.
author: Easside MJ Kamara

text: The pitfall of fear is it ability to make its possessor's a fugitive of terrors.
author: Easside MJ Kamara

text: The most educated is the self-taught.
author: Easside MJ Kamara

text: It's only difficult if you don't try.
author: Easside MJ Kamara

text: Each second spent on what you want to know, pushes you closer to knowing it.
author: Sadou Keita

text: Poorness is an oppressive state of mind.
author: Goddess Korhun

text: An explosive flame is an effect of war.
author: Easside MJ Kamara

text: Yesterday was the most difficult day.
author: Goddess Korhun
